definition: to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Einsun jumps to the first place in credit in the comprehensive test for the amount of annual examination in Southwest China.
sentences.chinese: 爱因森国际综合考场年考量考试信誉度跃居西南第一。

sentences.english: Look for no profit out of it, see no future in it, just the present.
sentences.chinese: 不要钻营于利益之中，没有未来的考量，只有现在。

sentences.english: Stocks are slightly lower as investors weigh up the chances of whether this is a major turning point.
sentences.chinese: 投资者考量这是一个重要转折点的几率，股市小跌。

sentences.english: When deciding whether or not to refinance, there are many factors to con sider.
sentences.chinese: 在决定是否重新贷款时，有许多因素要考量。

sentences.english: Therefore, to evaluate interregional government cooperation it is necessary to have public management point of view.
sentences.chinese: 因此，考量区域政府间合作就不能缺失公共管理视角。

sentences.english: You gauge the tiger's mood and put the leash on the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 你得考量一下老虎的情绪，然后用链子把它套住。

sentences.english: Retrievability of records is a major consideration.
sentences.chinese: 档案的可检调性是一项主要的考量。

sentences.english: Additionally, we are thinking how to save energy and reduce carbon dioxides .
sentences.chinese: 另外，也考量到要如何节能减碳，才能拯救地球。

sentences.english: As you can see, shipping containers meet these modularity considerations quite well.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到，集装箱很好地满足了这些模块化考量。

sentences.english: Here are some considerations and instructions for debugging multiple processes.
sentences.chinese: 以下是侦错多个处理序时需注意的考量重点和指示。

sentences.english: Mix to luxury bear luxuriantly force is become taller think standard.
sentences.chinese: 对奢侈和华丽的承受力成为更高的考量标准。

sentences.english: When looked at closely, all children's stories communicate simple views on good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 细细考量，童话故事传递的是最朴素的善恶观。

sentences.english: Happiness shouldn’t be our only consideration, but it should count.
sentences.chinese: 幸福并非我们唯一的考量，但是应该计算一下。

sentences.english: But the price as well as political considerations will ultimately decide the final winner.
sentences.chinese: 不过，价格以及政治考量将最终决定花落谁家。

sentences.english: Your class participation will also be considered in determining your final letter grade.
sentences.chinese: 课堂参与也将列入学期成绩考量。

sentences.english: Your period of meditation, reflection, or investigation will soon begin to wind down.
sentences.chinese: 你现阶段的考量，沉思或者是调查会开始尘埃落定。

definition: to consider/to weigh (a matter)/to balance (pros and cons)
pros and cons/merits and drawbacks/advantages and disadvantages
to regard as important/to care about
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
to discuss/to bring up various ideas for discussion
